Readme

BatchedRoutines

Batched routines (BLAS, LAPACK, etc.) for multi-dimensional arrays. This package provide both CPU and GPU support.

Installation

pkg> add BatchedRoutines

Supported Routines

BLAS Level 1

  • [x] batched_scal
  • [ ] batched_dot
  • [ ] batched_nrm2
  • [ ] batched_asum
  • [ ] batched_axpy!
  • [ ] batched_axpby
  • [ ] batched_iamax

BLAS Level 2

  • [ ] batched_gemv
  • [ ] batched_gbmv
  • [ ] batched_symv
  • [ ] batched_hemv
  • [ ] batched_sbmv
  • [ ] batched_hbmv
  • [ ] batched_trmv
  • [ ] batched_trsv
  • [ ] batched_ger
  • [ ] batched_syr
  • [ ] batched_her

BLAS Level 3

  • [x] batched_gemm (TODO: use gemm_batch when mkl is available)
  • [ ] batched_symm
  • [ ] batched_hemm
  • [ ] batched_syrk
  • [ ] batched_herk
  • [ ] batched_syr2k
  • [ ] batched_trmm
  • [ ] batched_trsm
  • [ ] batched_trmm

Linear Algebra

  • [x] batched_tr

Conventions

For routines (e.g gemm), we use a prefix batched_ for their corresponding routines in BLAS or LAPACK and they should only define with AbstractArray{T, 3} (batched matrix) or AbstractArray{T, 2} (batched vector).
